UdpBindingElement Class

In this Article

Represents a UDP binding element.

Syntax

Declaration

public class UdpBindingElement : System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ConfigurationElement
  • ServiceModelConfigurationElement
  • System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingElement
  • UdpBindingElement

Constructors summary

UdpBindingElement()

Initializes a new instance of the UdpBindingElement class.
UdpBindingElement(String)

Initializes a new instance of the UdpBindingElement class with specified name.

Properties summary

BindingElementType

Gets the type of the binding.
DuplicateMessageHistoryLength

Gets or sets the value of the maximum number of message hashes used in a UDP transport configuration element.
MaxBufferPoolSize

Gets or sets the maximum size of any buffer pools used by the transport.
MaxPendingMessagesTotalSize

Gets or sets a value that specifies the total size of messages that have been received but not yet removed from the property in a UDP binding element.
MaxReceivedMessageSize

Gets or sets the value of the maximum received message size property in a UDP binding element.
MaxRetransmitCount

Gets or sets the maximum retransmit count for the UDP binding element.
MulticastInterfaceId

Gets or sets the value of the network adapter that is used in a UDP binding element.
Properties

Gets the properties associated with the UDP binding element.
ReaderQuotas

Gets the reader quotas used in the UDP binding element.
TextEncoding

Gets or sets the text encoding used in the UDP binding element.
TimeToLive

Gets or sets the time to live for the UDP binding element.

Methods summary

InitializeFrom(Binding)

Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding.
OnApplyConfiguration(Binding)

Applies the specified binding to the UdpBindingElement instance.

    Property Value

    • Int64

      The maximum size of any buffer pools used.

  • MaxPendingMessagesTotalSize

    Gets or sets a value that specifies the total size of messages that have been received but not yet removed from the property in a UDP binding element.

    public long MaxPendingMessagesTotalSize { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int64

      The total size of pending messages.

  • MaxReceivedMessageSize

    Gets or sets the value of the maximum received message size property in a UDP binding element.

    Property Value

    • Int64

      The value of the maximum received message size property.

  • MaxRetransmitCount

    Gets or sets the maximum retransmit count for the UDP binding element.

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The maximum retransmit count.

    Property Value

    • String

      The value of the network adapter that is used in a UDP binding element.
